# tdid

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

These R functions calculate triple difference-in-differences (TDID) with controls using double-robust estimators. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of tdid from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` {r}
devtools::install_github("dorleventer/tdid")
```
